org.apache.twill.api
Interface TwillPreparer

public interface TwillPreparer

This interface exposes methods to set up the Twill runtime environment and start a Twill application.

Method Summary
 TwillPreparer addJVMOptions(String options)
          This methods adds extra JVM options that will be passed to the java command line for every runnable of the application started through this TwillPreparer instance.
 TwillPreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
          Adds a LogHandler for receiving an application log.
 TwillPreparer addSecureStore(SecureStore secureStore)
          Adds security credentials for the runtime environment to gives application access to resources.
 TwillPreparer enableDebugging(boolean doSuspend, String... runnables)
          Enable debugging for runnables.
 TwillPreparer enableDebugging(String... runnables)
          Enable debugging for runnables, without suspending the virtual machine to wait for the debugger.

 TwillController start()

Method Detail

addLogHandler

TwillPreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
Adds a LogHandler for receiving an application log.

Parameters:
handler - The LogHandler.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

setUser

@Deprecated
TwillPreparer setUser(String user)
Deprecated. This method will be removed in future version.

Sets the user name that runs the application. Default value is get from "user.name" by calling System.getProperty(String).

Parameters:
user - User name
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

setJVMOptions

TwillPreparer setJVMOptions(String options)
This methods sets the extra JVM options that will be passed to the java command line for every runnable of the application started through this TwillPreparer instance. This is intended for advance usage. All options will be passed unchanged to the java command line. Invalid options could cause application not able to start.

Parameters:
options - extra JVM options.

addJVMOptions

TwillPreparer addJVMOptions(String options)
This methods adds extra JVM options that will be passed to the java command line for every runnable of the application started through this TwillPreparer instance. This is intended for advance usage. All options will be passed unchanged to the java command line. Invalid options could cause application not able to start.

Parameters:
options - extra JVM options.

enableDebugging

TwillPreparer enableDebugging(String... runnables)
Enable debugging for runnables, without suspending the virtual machine to wait for the debugger. This replaces any previous debug settings.

Parameters:
runnables - the names of runnables to enable for debugging. If empty, it means all runnables.

enableDebugging

TwillPreparer enableDebugging(boolean doSuspend,
                              String... runnables)
Enable debugging for runnables. This replaces any previous debug settings.

Parameters:
doSuspend - whether the virtual machines should be supended until the debugger connects. This option allows to debug a container from the very beginning. Note that in that case, the container cannot notify the controller of its debug port until the debugger is attached - you must figure out where it is running using the YARN console or APIs.
runnables - the names of runnables to enable for debugging. If empty, it means all runnables.

withApplicationArguments

TwillPreparer withApplicationArguments(String... args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application. The arguments can be retrieved from TwillContext.getApplicationArguments().

Parameters:
args - Array of arguments.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withApplicationArguments

TwillPreparer withApplicationArguments(Iterable<String> args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application. The arguments can be retrieved from TwillContext.getApplicationArguments().

Parameters:
args - Iterable of arguments.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withArguments

TwillPreparer withArguments(String runnableName,
                            String... args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the TwillRunnable identified by the given name. The arguments can be retrieved from TwillContext.getArguments().

Parameters:
runnableName - Name of the TwillRunnable.
args - Array of arguments.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withArguments

                            Iterable<String> args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the TwillRunnable identified by the given name. The arguments can be retrieved from TwillContext.getArguments().

Parameters:
runnableName - Name of the TwillRunnable.
args - Iterable of arguments.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withDependencies

TwillPreparer withDependencies(Class<?>... classes)
Adds extra classes that the application is dependent on and is not traceable from the application itself.

Returns:
This TwillPreparer.
See Also:
withDependencies(Iterable)

withDependencies

TwillPreparer withDependencies(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
Adds extra classes that the application is dependent on and is not traceable from the application itself. E.g. Class name used in Class.forName(String).

Parameters:
classes - set of classes to add to dependency list for generating the deployment jar.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withResources

TwillPreparer withResources(URI... resources)
Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables.

Returns:
This TwillPreparer.
See Also:
withResources(Iterable)

withResources

TwillPreparer withResources(Iterable<URI> resources)
Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables. Useful for adding extra resource files or libraries that are not traceable from the application itself. If the URI is a jar file, classes inside would be loadable by the ClassLoader. If the URI is a directory, everything underneath would be available.

Parameters:
resources - Set of URI to the resources.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

withClassPaths

TwillPreparer withClassPaths(String... classPaths)
Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables.

Returns:
This TwillPreparer
See Also:
withClassPaths(Iterable)

withClassPaths

TwillPreparer withClassPaths(Iterable<String> classPaths)
Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables. Note that the paths would be just added without verification.

Parameters:
classPaths - Set of classpaths
Returns:
This TwillPreparer

addSecureStore

TwillPreparer addSecureStore(SecureStore secureStore)
Adds security credentials for the runtime environment to gives application access to resources.

Parameters:
secureStore - Contains security token available for the runtime environment.
Returns:
This TwillPreparer.

start

TwillController start()
Starts the application.

Returns:
A TwillController for controlling the running application.
